pr_title: HDDS-2848. Recon changes to make snapshots work with OM HA.

timeline.message: HDDS-2848. Recon changes to make snapshots work with OM HA.

timeline.bodyText: We don't need to set the Recon HTTP and RPC port. By default a free port is assigned. The setters are needed in case the test needs to know the port that was assigned.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to trigger an OM DB sync here and see if the sync is working?
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: I intended to test only changes I made but this Test class I envision can easily extend to add more tests for HA but those can be separate Jiras, IMO.
replies.author: swagle

timeline.bodyText: For single node RATIS, we can still use the regular URL.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: OM AFAIK is either 3 node RATIS or no HA based on this configuration, although not sure why we cannot check, the result should be the same.
replies.author: swagle

timeline.message: Verify snapshot is synced to Recon.
